tool.name: calc_bmi

param.name: in_Feats
param.dialogReference: Input polygon feature class for which BMI should be tabulated

param.name: fld_ID
param.dialogReference: Field in the input feature class containing unigue IDs for the polygons

param.name: in_BMI
param.dialogReference:
Feature class with conservation lands, "flattened" by BMI level.

NOTE: You may need to run the "Flatten Conservation Lands" tool to get the input needed.

param.name: fld_Basename
param.dialogReference:
The baseline of the field name to be used to store percent of polygon covered by selected conservation lands of specified BMI.

Example: If the baseline name is "BMI", the fields "BMI1", "BM2", "BMI3", and BMI4" will be created.

tool.summary: Tabulates the percentage of each input polygon covered by conservation lands with specified "Biodiversity Management Intent" (BMI) value.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Tabulates the percentage of each input polygon covered by conservation lands with specified "Biodiversity Management Intent" (BMI) value.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Virginia Natural Heritage Program (Kirsten R. Hazler)
